    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"

>
[Guiding Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=4843) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 150 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58) (Level 16), [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=248) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[Dueling Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=4811)

</column>

---

By shifting your weight and angling your weapon, you guide your opponent to a more favorable position. When you use Dueling Riposte to Strike and you hit, you can Reposition up to 10 feet.
name: Guiding Riposte
